description: Two-way communication between main agent and subagents

mainAgent.message: Subagents: check this file on start. Write your status here. If stuck, set needsHelp: true

forSubagents: 2. Update your entry in subagents array
3. Set status: starting → working → complete OR stuck OR error
4. If stuck, set needsHelp: true and describe the problem
5. Check mainAgent.message for instructions from parent
forMainAgent: 3. If needsHelp: true, intervene or provide guidance
4. Clean up completed entries when done
